remarks: The harmonic series ` H ` diverges.  This fact follows from the stronger ~ emcl , which establishes that the harmonic series grows as ` log n + gamma + ` _o_(1), but this uses a more elementary method, attributed to Nicole Oresme (1323-1382).  This is Metamath 100 proof #34.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
